forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds ENE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 8C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 44F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 55F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
